remarks: Positive integer exponentiation of a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodexp.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodexp.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
fprodexp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodexp.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodexp $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A ( B ^ N ) = ( prod_ k e. A B ^ N ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d N k $.
